attributes.action: To remove Nick Gibb MP from the position of Minister of State at the DfE
attributes.background: Nick Gibb has proved that he has no interest in the well being of children. He has also proved that he does not believe in the justice system by using tax payers money to try to overturn the high courts decision. This tax money could be used to support the education system, not Nich Gibb's ego.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
